pandu rakimada durwala wiya.mathiw wed (14) ha shen wotsan (15) adu lakunuwalata dawi yamen pasuwa klak ha wonar thewani kadulla wenuwen lakunu 184ka sabandathawak godanaguha.klak haye pahara 4k ha hathare pahara 5k ella kala athara wonar hathare pahara 4k ha haye paharak ella kaleya.klak dun uda pandu thunakma shri lanka pandu rakinnan athin gilihini.min wadathma kapi penune ohu lakunu 77k labagena sitiyadi hathare simawe â€˜dip skuweyar legâ€™ sthanayedi lasith malingage angiliwala wadi panduwa hathare simawata udin gos haye paharak wartha wimaya.me dawi yamen berunu klak, 44 wani oowarayedi fawis maharufta haye paharak, hathare paharak, haye paharak ha hathare paharak pita pita ella karamin sampurnayen lakunu 23k laba gaththeya.

â€” ayida nodanimi harila balune numbae desa mama jiwithe hungak langin indala...hungak durata hamadema therum gaththa kenek...jiwithe hamadema bedagaththa kenek eeka paratama nathi wunama...ekaparatama adu wunama ee histhana makanna harima amaruyi...ee aduwa purawanna ee wenuwata daha denek aawath harima amaruyi....kochchara uthsaha kalath kochchara wera dammath aththatama ee senehasa ee lengathukama nathi karanna harima amaruyi...kochchara kohoma kiyuwath dawasakata eka parak hari ee senehesa e aadaraya mathak wenwa api samahara awasthawaladi asaranawunama ee senehasa lengathukama balaporoththu wenawa....aagiyapu thani walin yanakota purudu mathakayan hitha ridawanawa wagema hariyata nuhuru lesa wage ee senehasa aapahu hoyanawa yalu madahasa mage hitha langa aala kathanda kiwa hati mata thama mathakayi mage nethulangarandunu hatinumbaa ayida nodanimi nohangune mata mage hitha numbaa kiyuwa hati thawa aale pirena kola sudu watha mage hitha langa hitiya arumaya thama rawdeyihitiya hati langa thurule welemin mage langa numbaa datha patalan para purawata awida giya ee soduru sawasama thama mathakayi gewunu mohathaka radunu senehesa hitha purawata thaniwa mama ada awida yannemi api awida giya puruduparema ayida nodanimi harila balune thaniwa yana wita man purudu ee manga desa hadawatha dahas warayak kodurana deyata wada buddhiya eka warayak kodurana deya watinawamama dannawasaha mama eya piligannawamata numbaa himi naha numbae senehasa himinahanamuth hada pura harima sathutin kiyanna puluwan mama numbae aadaraya windamata ee athi 'mulu jiwitha kalaya purawata hithin sathutu wenna mata ee mathakaya athi' sanda nena da palu ahasama ikigasayi mulu rama thaniyama.....
ara mulu lokenma konwechcha libiyawa, iranaya wage , suwasilanthaya wage ratawal ekkath giwisum thiyenawa ne.
ee athare minihek nathiwa welena meki diha handiye kollo tikath hitiye aha dagena.
